The brand of the wolf, supporting music
Find the whole Delorean recital in our Moon Archive
Stay alert in the next full moons
WELCOME TO THE FIRST ONLINE FESTIVAL

The Eristoff Internative Festival is the very first online music festival created and distributed exclusively over the Internet. It consists of a series of live, interactive concerts on the nights of the full moon, where users cease to be mere spectators and become an integral part of the event, creating it and modifying it as they go.

Does this mean that the concerts aren’t open to the public?

Exactly. You, at your computers, are the audience and stars of the show. Every concert is held in a secret lair, but if you’re a clever wolf, a true leader of the pack, there is always the chance that you might find your way to one of them.

Wolf friend, this is an online festival You can log on to the concerts from any Internet connection, interact with the group in its lair, help design the concert audiovisuals and howl to the rhythm of the best bands.
An unconventional festival can’t reveal all its secrets. Little by little, we’ll let you know more and more about the Eristoff Internative Festival.

At this festival, there are no tickets, no reservations, no traveling, no payments. All you have to do is log on to this website to enjoy a totally free online experience from your own computer. No matter where you are. No matter who you’re with. It’s that easy. If you are blogger you have the opportunity, to watch in first person the whole framework of this festival. Enter in Bloggers. If you are a viewer, you can decide a lot about the concert before it is held. Enter in Viewers.

Every time there is a FULL MOON, at 10:00 p.m. this website will become a large window to a live concert, and the howls will keep going until midnight.

If you are just a curious wolf, that might be enough for you. However, if you really want to get into the thick of it all, you’ll have to work a little harder to catch your prey.

Rarely has EP caused such a stir. It was just months ago that Delorean published the excellent Ayrton Senna album (Mushroom Pillow), recording four new electro-pop songs, but they are already getting acclaim from the public, national and international newspapers (including the prestigious Pitchfork).

With irresistible recordings backing them and projection that seems endless, the Basque quartet based in Barcelona will, in October, launch its long awaited LP which they promise will keep people dancing until they drop. There will be concerts full of intensity and energy from the explosive combination of pop, electronica and funk. Their only goal being to make you live through a unique experience. There´s on thing we can be sure of: that this autumn will be Delorean´s autumn. It should definitely catapult them to the top of dance music. You´ll be able to check it out live on Sunday the 4th of October at 10pm at the Eristoff Festival.

The [caja]Eristoff Internative Festival[/caja] is an online festival. But the leaders of the wolves have a unique opportunity to see what happens behind an online concert with a select pack. Once there we'll show you how to create this experience, how technically is recorded and disseminated. Besides being able to see the band in concert, of course. The travel and accommodation costs are on our own.
Besides, if you are one of the elects, you will receive the exclusive secret codes that allow attendees to interact online with the group and the stage. And of course, before anyone else will receive all material on the concert you have attended.
DOWNLOAD all the materials you need to power your race to become leader of the pack. And if you need anything else, don’t hesitate to get in touch with us.
ARE YOU THE ERISTOFF PACK LEADER? THEN <font size="20" color="#FFFFFF"> [caja]PARTICIPATE >[/caja] </font>
TO EARN YOUR SPOT AS PACK LEADER, YOU'VE GOT TO HOWL LOUDER THEN EVERYONE ELSE.
1. Sign up as a blogger. We’ll give you a banner to put on your blog.
<font color='#FFFFFF'>2.</font><font color='#005596'> To vote for you, all your readers and fans have to do is click on the banner. One reader from every blog will get to attend the concert.</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'>3.</font><font color='#005596'> The five bloggers with the most votes will get to attend the concert. It’s that easy.</font>
DO YOU WANT TO PARTICIPATE AS A PACK?
HOW DO YOU TURN YOUR READERS INTO VOTERS?

If you have blogger friends, you can compete together as a pack and all come together if you win.
All you have to do is sign up as a pack and send invites to your blogger friends (up to five blogs per pack).
We’ll send you a blog that will count all of your votes together. The pack with the most votes will win tickets to the concert.

The methods you choose are part of your strategy as a leader. But to get you going, if you turn out to be a winning blogger, we’ll pick a random name from all of the readers who voted for you and left their e-mail address on the banner.
The winning reader can go with you to the concert.
Just a small incentive to help boost the loyalty of your pack.

Lift your ears, the full moon is now approaching.
You can still poke your nose into the next internative concert.
FILL OUT THE FOLLOWING FORM, AND YOU'LL GET THE BANNER YOU NEED TO PARTICIPATE.
HOW DO YOU WANT TO PARTICIPATE?
I ACCEPT THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS

SEND INVITATIONS TO THE WOLVES YOU WANT IN YOUR PACK. JUST HAVE TO FILL IN THEIR E-MAIL ADDRESSES.
PACKS CAN HAVE UP TO FIVE BLOGGERS
I ACCEPT THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS
MODIFICA TUS DATOS Y ENVIANOSLOS DE NUEVO

These are the packs that the most wolves have voted for so far.
Do you dare challenge them?

MATERIAL FOR YOUR BLOG

DOWNLOAD all the materials you need to power your race to become leader of the pack. And if you need anything else, don’t hesitate to get in touch with us.

PARTICIPATION WIDGET FOR REGISTERED BLOGGERS

Remember, the more visible your widget, the more chance you have to be voted.

If you use a blog manager, copy the code and paste it into your sidebar, at the gadget that allows you to enter html code. If you have questions, contact us.
PLEASE REGISTER TO DOWNLOAD THIS MATERIAL.
LEAVE US THE EMAIL ADRESS THAT YOU REGISTERED WITH AND WE WILL SEND YOU A NEW PASSWORD
I ACCEPT THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS
We've sent you an email with the new password. Thanks!

WOLF, YOU CAN BE PART OF THIS CONCERT.
All you need are the SECRET CODES held by our winning bloggers. Visit the winning blogger of your choice and interact with the band
From here, your message will make it far.
From here, your message will make it far.
Upload a photo of yourself and you’ll be on stage.
Sign in with your name and make the moon your partner
Send your question when the concert is finished.
Click here to have access to the winner blogs
You need flash player 10. Download it here
These are the full moon nights that took place at the Eristoff Internative Festival. The howls were heard all across the internet. Now they will live on forever.
BE THE STARRING GUEST OF THE ERISTOFF INTERNATIVE FESTIVAL

We have prepared big surprises for the 4th of Octobers full moon night, at 10pm. New interactivity, new scenery, new group. But not everything is decided. As wolf viewers you can decide, amongst yourselves, some of the concert´s aspects. To start with, the song you would like to conclude the concert.

You decide wolf!
HOW DO YOU PARTICIPATE AS A SPECTATOR BEFORE THE CONCERT?
Take part in the voting on how you want the concert run.
Log into participating blogs, vote for the one you like best and then enter the draw for live tickets.
Follow us on MySpace, Facebook or Twitter.
Follow us on MySpace, Facebook or Twitter.
Delorean´s highest voted song will finish the next concert on the 4th of October.
MUST ENTER A DATE OF BIRTH
THE BLOGGER´S E-MAIL MUST BE VALID
SORRY BUT THIS PACK IS ALREADY COMPLETE
You must register to get your participation banner. Register
MUST ACCEPT THE LEGAL CONDITIONS FOR THE PACK
ONLY THE LEADER OF THE PACK CAN EXTEND IT
